devdoc.author: Miguel Piedrafita
devdoc.title: A fridge for all your Zorbs

Frozen(address,uint256).notice: Event emitted when a Zorb is frozen

Unfrozen(address,uint256).notice: Event emitted when a Zorb is unfrozen

onERC721Received(address,address,uint256.notice: Freezes a zorb with safeTransferFrom - this does not work without the safe transfer

unfreeze(uint256).notice: Unfreeze your `tokenId` Zorb from the last wallet and deposit the original NFT in your wallet.
